Text: Maianthemum (Latin "Māia " "May" and Greek "ánthemon " "flower"; including former "Smilacina") is a genus of rhizomatous, herbaceous, perennial flowering plants, native to the understory of woodlands.

Text: Maianthemum:  It is widespread across much of North America, Europe and Asia.
